body:
Comment 3: 
After the error message, ./all.bash continues and appears to have completed
successfully. However, note the improper directory for the commands; the /c/go/bin
directory was neither created nor used.

ALL TESTS PASSED

---
Installed Go for windows/386 in /c/go.
Installed commands in /c/go/src.
*** You need to add /c/go/src to your $PATH. ***
The compiler is 8g.
